s.text: The NYT , WP , and LAT report that things had unwound so much that the Israel delegation had packed their bags and some of their luggage was transferred to the airport.

Both the NYT and LAT fronts feature stories about so-called "smart guns" that can only be fired when held by the designated shooter, because of a distance-sensitive transponding device such as a finger ring.

Currently, 38 percent of the patrol's rank-and-file officers are Hispanic.

The most pressing demands appear to be for the Palestinians to repeal the PLO charter's provision calling for the destruction of Israel, and to turn over to the Israelis a number of suspected terrorists.
